column4: hi, my ipod is mounted at /media/ipod and it says it's a read only disk. i'm sure it shouldn't be. what do i do?
anyone??
please someone
hi, my ipod is mounted at /media/ipod and it says it's a read only disk. i'm sure it shouldn't be. what do i do? i can't put any music on it
if i can't figure this out i'm actually dead

you see my problem?
